data.title: Manuela Castelluccio Obituary - Parlin, New Jersey
data.meta_description: Parlin Manuela “Nellie” Castelluccio age 73 of the Madison Park section of Parlin passed away Saturday March 31st 2012 at Raritan Bay Medical Center, Old Bridge. Born in Newark she has resided in Madison Park since 1974.  Before her retirement 16 years ago she was employed in the Pathmark General Office in Carteret in the accounting department for 15 years.  Mrs. Castelluccio was a communicant of Saint Bernadette’s R. C. Church in Parlin where she was a member of the Senior Citizens Club.  She is predeceased by her husband Alexander S. Castelluccio in 2009, and her brother Ralph Zizza.  Surviving are her children and their spouses Donna Marie & Mark Babak of Valhalla, N.Y., Jeannine & Doug Weber of Parlin, Anthony & Debra Castelluccio of Andover and Alexis & Thomas Fischer of No Brunswick, her grandchildren Michael, Melissa, Luke, Anthony, Adriana, Nicholas, Nicole, Jeannine, Joseph, Thomas Jay and Lauren and her sisters Sandra Nalepka of Manville and JoAnn Kube of Jackson  Funeral services will be held Wednesday 10:15am from the Carmen F. Spezzi Funeral Home 15 Cherry Lane Parlin followed by a 11am mass at Saint Bernadette’s R. C. Church in Parlin with private cremation to follow.  Calling hours at the funeral home will be Tuesday from 2pm to 4pm and 7pm to 9pm. In lieu of flowers donations in Manuela’s name can be made to St Jude’s Children’s Hospital. Messages of condolences may be left for the family at www.spezzifuneralhome.com
